definition: the act of discharging someone because of age (especially to cause someone to retire from service on a pension)
details:
noun
- the act of discharging someone because of age (especially to cause someone to retire from service on a pension)
- the property of being out of date and not current
= synonyms: obsoleteness
- a monthly payment made to someone who is retired from work
= synonyms: old-age pension, retirement pension, retirement check, retirement fund
